{ "rules": { "no-forbidden-headers":{ "description": "OAS do not allow using the following HTTP headers in a specification file: Authorization, Content-Type and Accept. You MUST use the associate functionalities provided by OAS, instead.", "message": "{{error}} in {{path}} {{value}}", "severity": "error", "given": ["$..parameters[?(@.in == 'header')].name","$.[responses][*].headers.*~"], "then": {"function":"pattern","functionOptions":{"notMatch":"/^(accept|content-type|authorization)$/i"}} } } }
